text: Frank Santopadre (born February 7, 1961) is an American comedy writer and television producer, currently working as a staff writer on ABC's The View and as the co-producer and co-host of Gilbert Gottfried's Amazing Colossal Podcast. Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from New York City Category:American television writers Category:American television producers
title: Frank Santopadre
